invoice.add: INSERT INTO invoice (distributor_name, invoice_number, amount, date, payment_type, comment, delivered_by, bill_type) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8)
invoice.update: UPDATE invoice SET distributor_name = $1, invoice_number = $2, amount = $3, date = $4, payment_type = $5, comment = $6, delivered_by = $7, bill_type = $8 WHERE invoice_number = $2
